message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good deal of money.
Alice, my turn to be reasonable.  Let's wrap this up now and avoid the inflation hit.
Bob, we're losing money with every round. My last offer was generous, but I'm willing to meet you halfway to end this quickly.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out.  Meet me in the middle or this deal is off.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's a fair split, and we both need to agree before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, STOP THIS MADNESS. We're both being stubborn.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point. Take it or leave it.
